players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately."
Bob: "Diana, that's a blatant lie! I'm just a villager, and you're probably the mafia trying to frame me to save yourself. Let's vote her out instead."
You: "I'm not sure who to believe yet. Diana, why did you pick Bob to investigate? Bob, any proof you're innocent?"

Diana: "Bob, you can't provide proof because you ARE the mafioso. Alice, I investigated him because with only 4 players, I had limited choices and got lucky. If you don't vote Bob out now, he'll kill one of us tonight and win..."
You: "I believe Diana's claim. Let's vote for Bob to protect the town."
Bob: "Diana is desperate and lying to turn you against me, Alice! If she's really the detective, why not investigate someone else first? Vote for her to protect us!"
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
